page.title: 15HOUSING-GWERN COTTAGE
page.content: Gwern Cottage is in square C3 is one of the only six early thatched cottages of three unit , single storey internol chimney dwelling left in Wales.It was built around 1640.It is owned by Mr Jones Perrot and the last person to live in it was a person called Granny Holland. The cottage was competely re-furbished last year. A new thatched roof was put on. The reeds imported from Austria. Other timber framed hoses in the village include Tynllan,Ty Coch,Plas Cain Plas yn Dinas and Dolgain.Glanbrogan Hall is a Grade 11 listed building.
